summary: This is an email from an unspecified sender to an unspecified recipient (both likely within the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York) transmitting a final version of a briefing book for an Attorney General briefing scheduled for June 25, 2020. The email includes attachments with charging statistics to illustrate COVID-19 impact.

events.title: Attorney General Briefing
events.description: A briefing for the Attorney General is scheduled, for which a briefing book has been prepared.

keyFacts: The document is an internal email related to the preparation of a briefing for the Attorney General.
The email date is June 24, 2020, and references a briefing scheduled for the following day.
Attachments include a briefing book and a document comparing charging statistics to illustrate the impact of COVID-19.
The correspondence originates from and is sent to the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS).
The document itself contains no specific information about the Epstein case, but is a procedural email within the broader legal context.
